title: LSRE: Latent Semantic Rule Encoding for Real-Time Semantic Risk Detection in Autonomous Driving
summary: Real-world autonomous driving must adhere to complex human social rules that extend beyond legally codified traffic regulations. Many of these semantic constraints, such as yielding to emergency vehicles, complying with traffic officers' gestures, or stopping for school buses, are intuitive for humans yet difficult to encode explicitly.
